team.name: Gabe Low
team.title: Co-Founder
team.bio: Gabe hails from New York City. He is pursuing a degree in Finance and Management at Wharton and was recently elected into Beta Gamma Sigma, an academic honors society. After college, Gabe plans to start his career as a business analyst at a top consulting firm. He also has prior global strategy experience from interning at PepsiCo, as well as rapidly-scaling start-ups in India and Israel.
team.about: Gabe hates wasting time in long lines when he could be swimming, making tahini, or spending time with his 7 siblings.

team.name: Ben Shor
team.title: Co-Founder
team.bio: Ben is from Great Neck, NY. He is currently completing his degree in Economics and Business Management at Columbia University and will be joining a consumer and retail focused investment bank after he graduated. Ben also has financial analysis and investment strategy experience.
team.about: With his busy schedule, Ben does everything he can to save time, so he can spend it running, trying new foods, and traveling.

team.name: Rena Auerbach
team.title: Lead Engineer & Graphic Designer
team.bio: After receiving her BA in Computer Science from NYU, Rena went back home to Chicago, IL. Now she is taking CapTracks international to Herzliya, Israel, where she hopes to start her professional career as a Software Engineer. Rena is a full-stack developer with experience in a handful of programming languages, but her favorites are Java and JavaScript.
team.about: When she's not avoiding long lines, Rena enjoys playing with her dog, painting, and running her eBay business.

team.name: Lauren Treiman
team.title: Data Analyst
team.bio: Lauren was born and raised in Salt Lake City, UT and is currently pursuing her Masters in Statistics at Emory University. She has a diverse background in data analytics with experience developing statistical models in epidemiology, social networking, swimming, and Major League Baseball operations.
team.about: Instead of waiting in long lines, Lauren would much rather spend her free time playing water polo, swimming, or solving logic puzzles.
